Our Services

Acupuncture

Acupuncture is recognized worldwide as an effective health care system. More and more people are using this gentle and safe treatment for preventing and treating the disease.

In addition, it can treat a range of diseases and disorders, including acute and chronic conditions. Especially for unclear discomfort and diseases, such as fatigue, feeling weak, poor sleep quality.

Therefore, acupuncture cannot only treat diseases and injuries, but it can maintain well-being. This is especially important for the urbanite.

Know more about Yihong Acupuncture Adelaide …

Dry Needing

Dry needling is a modern treatment designed to ease muscular pain. Its popularity is growing.

During dry needling, a practitioner inserts several filiform needles into your skin. Filiform needles are fine, short, stainless steel needles that don’t inject fluid into the body. That’s why the term “dry” is used.

It’s not the same as acupuncture, although there are similarities between the two techniques. The main difference between dry needling and acupuncture is the theory behind why the methods work.

Know more about Yihong Acupuncture Adelaide …

Cupping

Cupping is much like the inverse of massage – rather than applying pressure to muscles, it uses gentle pressure to pull them upward. For most patients, this is a particularly relaxing and relieving sensation.

Based on the meridian theory of the body,  cupping removes any stagnation in the body and opens the meridians so that qi can flow freely.

Moreover, it is good for deep tissue repair. For instance, it allows the tissues to release toxins, activate the lymphatic system, promotes blood circulation. In conclusion, cupping therapy has bi-directional regulating actions and unique efficacy.

Know more about Yihong Acupuncture Adelaide …

Remedial Massage

When muscles and tendons become damaged or impaired, knotted and tense or immobile, Remedial Massage provides a healing treatment that can be gentle or strong, deep or shallow.

Key benefits of Remedial Massage include the stimulation to the blood supply which allows toxins in the muscles to be removed; the calming of the peripheral nervous system to ease pain and discomfort; and the toning and relaxing of muscles to improve joint mobility. Muscular and skeletal dysfunction often addresses with Remedial Massage include fibrositis, spondylitis, arthritis, frozen shoulder, muscular cramps and spasms, Whiplash,  muscular atrophy, sports and dancing injuries. Know more about Yihong Acupuncture Adelaide …

Acupuncture

2021年1月19日
Acupuncture is an ancient medical practice, originating in China more than 2,000 years ago. This article explains what acupuncturists do, and questions you might ask. It also describes a typical visit and how you can find an appropriately qualified acupuncturist. What is acupuncture? Acupuncture uses metal needles to stimulate points in the body, often with the addition of manual manipulation, heat or electrical stimulation. Some practitioners use lasers instead of needles to stimulate the acupuncture points. While acupuncture does appear to help in the treatment of some conditions, the theory of acupuncture is not able to be explained by current medical science. It's considered a complementary therapy. Is acupuncture effective? Studies have shown that acupuncture may help with: …
